Articles.Content:
Well I finally after months made both orbits, USING NO MODS. well I started this world 2 hours before this screen shot, but ive been playing for months and achieved Kerbin orbit atleast 10 times, but this is my first Mun orbit!

Yes im a noob, just kinda happy I finally made this!

Kerbin orbit looks off, its just the angle, the AP and PA are only actually off by 1,000 which is unnoticeable!

Yeah, 1000 is good. The kraken will throw it more then that on 1x time warp anyways. Good job

Also, nice polar orbits.

Congratulations Carnanty!

If you set the map view just so, on the correct day, it\'ll make a nice 'bull\'s eye' on Kerbin.

Congratulations Carnanty!

If you set the map view just so, on the correct day, it\'ll make a nice 'bull\'s eye' on Kerbin.

Haha good idea

Yeah, 1000 is good. The kraken will throw it more then that on 1x time warp anyways. Good job

Also, nice polar orbits.

Thanks on the grats, but im not sure what you mean by the Kraken though hahaha.

Haha good idea

Thanks on the grats, but im not sure what you mean by the Kraken though hahaha.

Ever noticed how when you are in a stable orbit, no engines thrusting, your orbit on the map view will flop around anyways on normal time? This is the kraken. I believe the probable cause is rounding errors in the physics engine. It is extenuated at high speed, to the point that when you go into near kerbol orbits physics just implodes completely.
Ive seen wobbly orbits, but that only happens when my ship is wobbling because of a rocket not strapped to it, I cant say ive ever seen the physics mess up.
yay for orbits although if you think that was hard you should have a go at landing on the mun with stock parts, the legs are build like toothpicks
Ya ive been trying ever since i posted this, haha the legs keep breaking xD

Did you use mechjeb...

No I use vanilla, Mechjeb is cheating to me.

Same...

Though I have high doubts of how you can time and achieve a orbit with a difference of 1 KM between the PA and AP

Same...

Though I have high doubts of how you can time and achieve a orbit with a difference of 1 KM between the PA and AP

Patience and concentration, took like 2 minutes once i had the orbit.
